summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the sale of certain City Property (City Light Department) in Block 4, Jefferson Heights Addition, Division No. 1 to the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle (METRO) for a rectifier site and an appurtenant electrical feeder easement in said block to serve said rectifier. (METRO Rectifier - R/W 7659-11) (P.M. \#240421-2-302)
